website_summaries.verdict: A 21 by 17-inch, 120 volt, black, two-burner electric cooktop with analog controls.
pros: Kenyon's Arctic 2-burner cooktop is closer to a square layout than the company's other models
It features an 8-inch, 1800 watt burner and a 6.5-inch, 1200 watt burner
The unit includes a number of safety features to help prevent accidental burns
cons: Although the surface area is larger than the other models, the burner placement is a little too close together

customer_reviews.title: great 120v solution for basement suite
customer_reviews.text: great value for a 120v application! Simple install. Just wish the two burners had a bit more space in between. If you have a full size frying pan on the main burner, it overlaps the other burner, making it difficult to also have a pot on the small burner.just requires planning
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Churly

customer_reviews.title: This was a direct replacement for GE Two Burner Electric Cooktop JP202DWW P202DWW
customer_reviews.text: This was a direct replacement for GE Two Burner Electric Cooktop JP202DWW P202DWW, the original replacement from GE is $700 so this was a 110 optionand they also have a 220 option. Fit perfectly and installed easy.
customer_reviews.author: john carnes

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: special for places with little space works in your basement the stove is small but do not be confused it is full of power the water boils in 4 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Blizto21

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and tinny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 weeks ago and it works amazing .it is easy to install and clean . I recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Omar A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I installed it on the deck of our yacht and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Product came without screws.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this but it came without screw. I do not know why we received this stove with hair crack on glass top. we see that next day after installation.
customer_reviews.author: Pratik Patel

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for what I needed. It has one small and one large burner. I never use three burners anyway. We put it on our boat and it works perfectly!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma JJO

customer_reviews.title: soon to use
customer_reviews.text: Well the Kenyon arrived in record time. It is going into a basement kitchen and has not been installed yet. It is nice looking and will fit in nicely. Hopefully it will work as well as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: sharolyn g moffit

customer_reviews.title: new stove top
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect easy to install and works great good buy
customer_reviews.author: Dan Boklage

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was just what it was pictured. Fit perfect in the hole, I'm very happy with the heat..
customer_reviews.author: Barb

product_meta.title: Kenyon B41603 6-1/2 and 8-Inch Arctic 2-Burner Cooktop with Analog Control UL, 120-volt, Black
product_meta.description: Now remodeling and upgrading to "green" specifications is possible sans costly and laborious countertop replacement. Sized to fit an existing standard coil cooktop opening and available in 120, 208 or 240 Volts, the Polar Series is equipped with push-to-turn controls, infinite heat control and quick-to-heat radiant ribbon elements. Safety features include heat limiting cooking surface protectors, an On indicator light for each burner, and a Hot burner indicator light. And as all Kenyon products, backed by uncompromising quality and an exclusive 3-year product replacement warranty.
feature_bullets: One 8" Burner (1800 Watts); One 6.5" Burner (1200 Watts)
